item.title: Minorities Commission chairman visits residential schools in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Chairman of the Karnataka Minorities Commission U. Nisar Ahmed visited minorities residential schools in Raichur district on Thursday.
He inspected conditions in the residential schools and the quality of food being served to students.
Mr. Ahmed asked the officers of the department concerned to ensure that all basic needs are provided for students and to maintain quality of food.
